item.title: About
item.description: About me Hello there! Welcome to my little corner of this vast world wide web. My name is Guilherme Johansson Tramontina. I develop software for a living. I’m currently working as a software developer at InDebted, in the beautiful Sydney, Australia. Social Media I’m not an avid user of social media. In fact, I try to avoid it as much as I can. There are, though, a few that I end up using more than I’d like to admit.
